title: Huobi Reclaims $8 Million In Stolen ETH After Offering Bounty to Hacker
description: The centralized exchange paid the attacker 250 ETH as a "white hat bonus."

title: Stars Arena secures funding to plug $3M shortfall following exploit, will reopen after security audit
description:
Stars Arena, an Avalanche-based social media dApp, has responded to a recent $2.9 million security breach by securing the necessary resources to cover the associated losses. The platform has also engaged a white hat team to conduct a security assessment. The team is composed of ethical hackers and will rigorously assess the platform for vulnerabilities. […]

The post Stars Arena secures funding to plug $3M shortfall following exploit, will reopen after security audit appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: NFTs Can’t Catch a Break as Protracted Drop in Sales Continues
description: For the seventh week straight, non-fungible token (NFT) sales have slipped further. In the last week alone, NFT transactions totaled $66.11 million, marking an 11.65% decline from the previous week. NFT Sales Bleed Out: The Unrelenting Seven-Week Descent Although the broader crypto market experienced some uplift, NFT sales didn’t mirror this positive trend. Week after […]

title: Microsoft CEO Expresses Concerns Over AI and Competition in Testimony
description: In recent testimony during an antitrust lawsuit against Alphabet, Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella shared his views on artificial intelligence (AI) and competition, highlighting concerns about the potential pitfalls of AI and addressing allegations of anticompetitive practices by Google. title: UAE and India Forge Strategic Partnership for Sustainable Industrial Development
description: In a significant move towards bolstering their economic and technological ties, the United Arab Emirates (UAE) and India have inked a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) covering seven critical areas aimed at fostering sustainable industrial development. The collaboration is set to drive joint investments, technology transfers, and the deployment of cutting-edge technologies across industries. The bilateral ... Read more

title: Stablecoin market cap down 35% 18 months after Terra collapse
description: Terraform's collapse last year and the subsequent fall of its native Terra USD (UST) stablecoin triggered a chain reaction. Stablecoin valuation shrank from $189 billion to $123 billion.

title: Shiba Inu: “Something Huge Is Brewing” in the Ecosystem – Is SHIB Poised to Explode in Price to $0.0001?
description: Shiba Inu lead developer has hinted at a big announcement to be made in the near future, stating that something huge is brewing.
